desc: Mostly reordered and common products, this basket contains very little meat/fish and is likely to be ordered in the morning.
This basket is very balanced and contains a mix of all sorts of goods. These orders are typically placed each week around mid-day.
This order is heavy on organic veggies and dairy products. A relatively large order, made up of mostly reordered and popular items.
This basket is more adventurous and contains vegetables, organics, and fish that the user has not ordered before. Some snacks help balance things.
This basket is a meat-lovers delight; also heavy on pre-packed products like cheese, canned goods, and prepared soups/salads.
These orders are full of yummy snacks and gluten products. You won't find many vegetables or dairy products here.
